# docker_org_team (Data Source)

Reads information about a Docker Hub organization team.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `org_name` (String) The organization name.
- `team_name` (String) The team name.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this data source (org_name/team_name).
- `member_count` (Number) Number of members in the team.
- `team_description` (String) The team description.
